subtitle:
1
00:00:22,400 --> 00:00:24,300
Sè-hàn tha̍k kok-hāu-á ê sî-chūn,
When I was little and studying in elementary school,

2
00:00:24,300 --> 00:00:26,600
Gún a-bú chhōa góa khì ha̍k-hāu.
My mother took me to school.

3
00:00:26,600 --> 00:00:29,400
I iōng chheⁿ-so͘ ê Hôa-gí kóng-ōe,
She spoke in unfamiliar Mandarin,

4
00:00:29,400 --> 00:00:32,100
Tòa tio̍h Tâi-gí ê khiuⁿ-kháu.
Carrying a Taiwanese accent.

5
00:00:32,100 --> 00:00:37,200
Hit-tang-chūn góa ê sim-lāi sī kám-kak chin pháiⁿ-sè.
At that time, I felt very embarrassed in my heart.

6
00:00:37,700 --> 00:00:43,300
Hit-tang-chūn góa ê sim-lāi sī kám-kak chin pháiⁿ-sè.
At that time, I felt very embarrassed in my heart.

7
00:00:44,700 --> 00:00:47,100
Chit-má ōaⁿ góa chhōa lí khì ha̍k-hāu.
Now it's my turn to take you to school.

8
00:00:47,100 --> 00:00:49,700
Góa iōng a-má ê ōe kah lí kóng-ōe.
I speak to you in Grandma's language.

9
00:00:49,700 --> 00:00:51,700
Ū-chi̍t-kang lí kám ē mn̄g góa,
One day, will you ask me,

10
00:00:51,700 --> 00:00:54,500
Lán tau kóng ê ōe ná ē kah lâng bô sio-kâng?
Why is the language spoken at our home different from others?

11
00:00:54,500 --> 00:00:59,600
Hit-tang-chūn lí ê sim-lāi kám ē kám-kak chin pháiⁿ-sè?
At that time, will you feel very embarrassed in your heart?

12
00:01:00,100 --> 00:01:05,800
Hit-tang-chūn lí ê sim-lāi kám ē kám-kak chin pháiⁿ-sè?
At that time, will you feel very embarrassed in your heart?

13
00:01:06,800 --> 00:01:12,100
Gín-á, che sī a-chó͘ kah a-kong a-má kóng ê ōe.
Child, this is the language spoken by great-grandparents and grandparents.

14
00:01:12,300 --> 00:01:17,500
Gín-á, che sī a-kong a-má kah a-pa kóng ê ōe.
Child, this is the language grandparents spoke to Dad.

15
00:01:17,600 --> 00:01:21,200
Sī góa sim-lāi siōng súi ê gí-giân,
It is the most beautiful language in my heart,

16
00:01:21,200 --> 00:01:23,100
Chai-iáⁿ lán tùi tó-ūi lâi.
Knowing where we come from.

17
00:01:23,100 --> 00:01:26,700
Sī góa sim-lāi siōng súi ê gí-giân,
It is the most beautiful language in my heart,

18
00:01:26,700 --> 00:01:28,700
Chai-iáⁿ beh tùi tó-ūi khì.
Knowing where we are going.

19
00:01:28,700 --> 00:01:31,700
Sī góa sim-lāi siōng un-loán ê gí-giân.
It is the warmest language in my heart.

20
00:01:31,700 --> 00:01:35,500
Sī a-pah tùi lí kóng ê ōe.
It is the words Dad speaks to you.

21
00:02:10,000 --> 00:02:12,500
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

22
00:02:12,500 --> 00:02:15,000
Ba̍k-sái sī póe-bōe-lī.
Tears cannot be wiped away.

23
00:02:15,400 --> 00:02:17,900
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

24
00:02:17,900 --> 00:02:20,500
Sī siáng koah-tn̄g lán ê chhùi-chi̍h?
Who was it that cut off our tongues?

25
00:02:20,800 --> 00:02:23,200
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

26
00:02:23,200 --> 00:02:25,900
Ba̍k-sái sī póe-bōe-lī.
Tears cannot be wiped away.

27
00:02:26,300 --> 00:02:28,700
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

28
00:02:28,700 --> 00:02:31,400
Sī siáng koah-tn̄g lán ê chhùi-chi̍h?
Who was it that cut off our tongues?

29
00:02:33,100 --> 00:02:35,200

When I was little and studying in elementary school,

44

45
00:03:33,900 --> 00:03:37,500
Sī góa sim-lāi siōng súi ê gí-giân,
It is the most beautiful language in my heart,

46

48
00:03:42,300 --> 00:03:46,200
Sī a-pah tùi lí kóng ê ōe.

49
00:04:09,800 --> 00:04:12,300
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

50
00:04:12,300 --> 00:04:15,300
Khǹg tī sim-koaⁿ-lāi puh-gê.
Placed in the heart to sprout.

51
00:04:15,300 --> 00:04:18,100
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,
Mother's words, mother's words,

52
00:04:18,100 --> 00:04:20,900
Thèng-hāu chhun-thiⁿ beh khui-hoe.
Waiting for spring to blossom.

53
00:04:21,100 --> 00:04:23,500
A-bú ê ōe, a-bú ê ōe,

54

vocab.def: to lead / to take someone somewhere (A2)
